text: "Message to My Girl" is a 1984 song by New Zealand art rock band Split Enz and is the second single from their ninth studio album Conflicting Emotions. It went to number 28 in New Zealand, number 12 in Australia and number 13 in the Netherlands. In 2007 concert Neil Finn dedicated to the song to his wife Sharon. ==Track listing== #"Message to My Girl" – 4:01 #"Kia Kaha (Ever Be Strong)" – 3:35 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Split Enz songs
title: Message to My Girl
